text: Niye warusia Abakhayi okhurula mu balia bahebwa eshitabu Mutsinzu tsiabu, ebise biokhuwuya khwa ambeli, shimwaparakhwo mbu banyala okhurula tawe, nibapara mbu tsingoba tsiabu tsilabaliinda khu Nyasaye, halali Nyasaye yaboolela munjila yabalamanyile tawe, nara amayendo mumioyo chiabu, basambulanga tsinzu tsiabu nemikhono chiabu, nende emikhono chiabasuubili, khoparemwo enywe abetsimoni
